ov.alert.name: ov.alert
ov.alert.description: Controls alerts for the whole application.

ov.authentication.name: ov.authentication
ov.authentication.description: Service to authenticate / logout or manipulate authenticated user informations.

ov.entity.name: ov.entity
ov.entity.description: Manage OpenVeo entities described in conf.js.

ov.name: ov
ov.description:
Main OpenVeo module.

Loads all AngularJS dependencies and plugins modules. It also initializes formly and define routes exposed
by OpenVeo core.

ov.storage.name: ov.storage
ov.storage.description: Helper module to manipulate local storage.

alertService.name: alertService
alertService.description: Defines a generic alert management system to display one or several messages.

authenticationService.name: authenticationService
authenticationService.description:
Defines an authentication service to deal with user authentication.
Exposes methods to deal with user information and to sign in or logout.

entityService.name: entityService
entityService.description: Defines an entity service to create / update or remove an entity.

i18nService.name: i18nService
i18nService.description: Defines an internationalization service to manage string translations.

translateFilter.name: translateFilter
translateFilter.description:
Defines a filter to translate an id, contained inside a dictionary,
into the appropriated text.

applicationService.name: applicationService
applicationService.description: Defines service to manage the web service applications.

menuService.name: menuService
menuService.description: Defines a menu service to manage the menu of the application.

ovMultiCheckBox.name: ovMultiCheckBox
ovMultiCheckBox.description:
Creates a new Angular directive as an HTML element ov-multi-check-box to be able to create a list of checkboxes
with a single model.

ovTags.name: ovTags
ovTags.description:
Creates a new Angular directive as an HTML element ov-tags to be able to create a tags form element.

Tags form element is composed of an input element to add tags followed by the list of added tags.
example:
var listOfTags = ['tag1', 'tag2'];
    <ov-tags ng-model="listOfTags" ng-model-options="{ allowInvalid: true }"></ov-tags>

truncateFilter.name: truncateFilter
truncateFilter.description: Truncates a text to 35 characters and add '...' at the end of the truncated string.

userService.name: userService
userService.description: Defines service to manage roles and permissions.

storageProvider.name: storageProvider
storageProvider.description:
Defines a storage provider to help store information.
For now sessionStorage and localStorage are supported.

utilService.name: utilService
utilService.description: Defines an Util service to expose helper function.

classitems.description:
Adds a new dictionary, to the translation table, for the current
language.
A dictionary is referenced by its name and contains a JSON
representation of all its translations.
If dictionary does not exist yet, get it from the server.

params.name: name
params.description:
The name of the dictionary to retrieve from
server

params.name: admin
params.description:
true to retrieve a dictionary for the back
office part (which requires authentication), false to get a
dictionary without access restriction

return.description: The promise to retrieve the dictionary

classitems.name: addDictionary

classitems.description: Removes a dictionary from cache.
classitems.name: removeDictionary

classitems.description: Gets a dictionary with all its languages or just for the specific language.

return.description: The translations contained in the dictionary

classitems.name: getDictionary

return.description: The current language country code (e.g en-US)

params.name: language
params.description: The current language country code (e.g en-CA)

classitems.name: getLanguageName

classitems.description: Looks for a translation inside a translations object.

return.description:
The translated text corresponding to the given id
in the translations or the unchanged id if no translation found

classitems.description: Translates the given id using current language.

params.name: dictionary
params.description: The name of a particular dictionary if several dictionaries are loaded

classitems.name: translate

classitems.description: Destroys I18nService cached data.
classitems.name: destroy

classitems.description: Initializes supported languages.

Translates an id, contained inside a dictionary, into the appropriated text. **translate** filter helps translate a dictionary id. If id is not found in the specified dictionary for the actual language, it will search in the english version of the dictionary.
If id is not found in the dictionary, the id is not translated and will be printed as is.
If the dictionary is not specified, it will look for the id in all loaded dictionaries.
For each dictionary analyzed, if the id does not exist in the actual language it will try in the english version of the dictionary.
After all, if id is not found in any versions of the list of dictionaries, the id is not translated and will be printed as is.

params.name: dictionaryName
params.description: An optional dictionary to prevent looking in all dictionaries

classitems.name: translate

home page. Otherwise, set the form as on error.

application. All actions not handled in partials are handled

and broadcast a loggedOut event to children controllers.

classitems.description:

It overrides AngularJS $render.
Updates model when a checkbox is modified.

Listens to model modifications coming from outside the directive.

If model is modified from outside the directive, the view needs to be updated.

Tests if the model is empty.

It overrides AngularJS $isEmpty.

return.description: true if there is no checked checkboxes, false otherwise
